channel.title: ~client picture~
channel.description: ok so i downloaded a client and i HATE the backround when the client loads. Any tips on how to change it??

item.title: ~client picture~
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

matthewboi12:

dude… this dude is dumb, no offece… “where would i find this client directory” wdf is he like 7?.. no offece but learn something =D

This is the reason why we don’t improve and clean up our act here on Mopar… New coders deserve to get a chance to code. Anyway, it really depends on what client you are using… Along with what type of Version [317-546], so, usually it’s in the: cache folder, main file [all .java files] or in your “Sprites” folder. And look for a image with the size: 766x503

Read full topic

item.title: ~client picture~
item.dc:creator: @S_I_N_N_E_R S I N N E R
item.description:
@S_I_N_N_E_R wrote:

Get the picture you want and make sure the size is about 773 x 503.
Then what you want to do is open up the origianl client background in paint.

Then… you will see a tool on the top left hand side, it looks like a dotted box, after that right click the picture, hit paste from and load the client background you want to use… simple way without changing the directory.

Read full topic
